name: Rocket Jump (itch) (TututGames)
description:
This is my first solo game.  I did everything in a week, but I came back later to adjust a few things. The game is dev on Pico-8 so in Lua.

The main difference with Flappy Bird is the speed change. You can change it during the menu for more challenges.Controls :

Press C or Arrow Up for jump.
In Menu use Arrow Left and Right for change game speed.

Rules :

Jump between towers for survive and gain many point.
Warning : There are the Twins Towers but you can't crash on them. We aren't terrorists.

Credit :

Cedrico -> beta tester and the player with the best score at the release.
